trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DeleteTreeAccessRule" /> class represents a specific type of access rule that is used to allow or deny an Active Directory Domain Services object the right to delete all child objects, regardless of the permissions that the child objects have.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DeleteTreeAccessRule" /> 類別 (Class) 表示特定型別的存取規則，用於允許或拒絕 Active Directory 網域服務物件刪除所有子物件的權限 (不論子物件具有何種使用權限)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DeleteTreeAccessRule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DeleteTreeAccessRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 物件，可識別存取規則的信任項。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 列舉值，可指定存取規則類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DeleteTreeAccessRule" /> class with the specified identity reference and access control type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的識別參考和存取控制類型，初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DeleteTreeAccessRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 物件，可識別存取規則的信任項。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 列舉值，可指定存取規則類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> 列舉值，可指定存取規則的繼承類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DeleteTreeAccessRule" /> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, and Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的識別參考、存取控制型別和 Active Directory 網域服務安全性繼承，初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DeleteTreeAccessRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 物件，可識別存取規則的信任項。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 列舉值，可指定存取規則類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> 列舉值，可指定存取規則的繼承類型。

trans-unit.source: The schema GUID of the child object type that can inherit this access rule.
trans-unit.target: 可繼承此存取規則之子物件類型的結構描述 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DeleteTreeAccessRule" /> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance, and inherited object type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的識別參考、存取控制型別、Active Directory 網域服務安全性繼承和繼承的物件型別，初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DeleteTreeAccessRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。
